title: Neo Technology Prepares To Take On All Comers In Graph Database Market
description: Neo Technology, the makers of the Neo4j graph database, may not be a household name, but you very likely access graph database technology on daily basis, whether you know it or not — and it’s a market that growing by leaps and bounds and getting the attention of some of the biggest names in the business. Graph databases make logical connections for you. It’s what helps… Read More
